# rabbitmq_vhost (Data Source)

The `rabbitmq_vhost` data source retrieves information about a vhost.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the vhost.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the vhost.
